psionic.name: TKFist
psionic.title: TK Fist
psionic.description: Creates a striking blast of telekinetic power

psionic.name: Hold
psionic.title: Hold
psionic.description: Holds a target ship in place

psionic.name: Crush
psionic.title: Crush
psionic.description: Holds a target ship in place while also inflicting crush damage

psionic.name: Repair
psionic.title: Repair
psionic.description: Use telekinesis to repair existing ship armor

psionic.name: Fear
psionic.title: Fear
psionic.description: Use telepathy to instill fear and cause a ship to flee

psionic.name: Inspiration
psionic.title: Inspiration
psionic.description: Provides some temporary resistance to psionic attacks for targeted ships

psionic.name: Reveal
psionic.title: Reveal
psionic.description: Telepathically reveals cloaked ships for a short duration

psionic.name: Listen
psionic.title: Listen
psionic.description: Reveals a ship's desitnation and target

psionic.name: Block
psionic.title: Block
psionic.description: Provides greater, permanent resistance to psionic attacks for targeted ships

psionic.name: PsiDrain
psionic.title: Psi Drain
psionic.description: Drains psionic power from target ship

psionic.name: WildFire
psionic.title: WildFire
psionic.description: Uses telepathy to cause targeted crew to lose control of weapons and fire randomly in all directions

psionic.name: Control
psionic.title: Control
psionic.description: Gain telekinetic control of an entire ship for short period

psionic.name: Posses
psionic.title: Possession
psionic.description: Possess the minds of target crew, causing insanity and reckless destruction of the ship's critical systems

psionic.name: Mirage
psionic.title: Mirage
psionic.description: Confuses enemy with three telepathically generated copies of your ship

psionic.name: FalseFriend
psionic.title: False Friend
psionic.description: Force enemy minds to percieve your ship as one of their own

psionic.name: Invisibility
psionic.title: Invisibility
psionic.description: Prevent enemy minds from perceiving your ship in any way
